snippet: The Internet is not just for computer companies any more. Two powerful telephone carriers, MCI and Pacific Bell, disclosed plans yesterday to offer a broad range of Internet services to businesses and individuals.   The MCI Telecommunications Corp...
lead_paragraph: The Internet is not just for computer companies any more. Two powerful telephone carriers, MCI and Pacific Bell, disclosed plans yesterday to offer a broad range of Internet services to businesses and individuals. The MCI Telecommunications Corporation said it planned to take advantage of its international networks and brand name to become a national Internet service provider, offering residential and business customers dial-up access to the Internet, as well as special consumer software for using the Internet service known as the World Wide Web.

headline.main: Pacific Bell, MCI to Expand Internet Service
